currentMovies.title: The Matrix Resurrections
currentMovies.storyline: Neo returns to the Matrix, still unsure of what is real and what is not, as he seeks to uncover the truth about his existence.

currentMovies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
currentMovies.storyline: Peter Parker's identity as Spider-Man is revealed, leading to a dangerous confrontation with villains from alternate realities, forcing him to seek help from Doctor Strange.

upcomingMovies.title: Avatar 2
upcomingMovies.storyline: Jake Sully and Neytiri navigate Pandora's lush ecosystem, facing new threats while discovering more about the planet's indigenous population.

upcomingMovies.title: Jurassic World: Dominion
upcomingMovies.storyline: Dinosaurs roam freely on mainland USA, threatening human existence, as former Jurassic World inhabitants must find a way to coexist with these ancient creatures.

upcomingMovies.title: Wonder Woman 1984
upcomingMovies.storyline: Diana Prince faces off against Maxwell Lord and the Cheetah, while dealing with the return of her long-lost love, Steve Trevor, in the vibrant 1980s.

upcomingMovies.title: Dune
upcomingMovies.storyline: Paul Atreides, a young nobleman, leads a rebellion to reclaim his homeland from the oppressive rule of House Harkonnen, while also unlocking his own latent powers.

upcomingMovies.title: Black Widow
upcomingMovies.storyline: Natasha Romanoff confronts her past as a spy and the broken relationships she left behind, while facing a deadly conspiracy linked to her former life.

upcomingMovies.title: No Time to Die
upcomingMovies.storyline: James Bond comes out of retirement to face Safin, a new villain armed with dangerous technology, as he races against time to save the world.

upcomingMovies.title: Oppenheimer
upcomingMovies.storyline: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer's role in the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.
